exceptions.exn: In environment orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params rri : raft_refinement_interface cei : candidate_entries_interface vci : votes_correct_interface cci : cronies_correct_interface olpti : one_leader_per_term_interface h : name net : network st' : name -> data ps' : list packet out : list raft_output d : raft_data l : list (name * msg) client : clientId id : nat c : input H : handleClientRequest h (nwState net h) client id c = (out, d, l) H0 : leader_sublog_host_invariant net /\\ leader_sublog_nw_invariant net H1 : raft_intermediate_reachable net H2 : forall h' : name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h d h' H3 : forall p' : packet, In p' ps' -> In p' (nwPackets net) \\/ In p' (send_packets h l) Unable to unify "handleClientRequest h (nwState net h) client id c = (out, d, l)" with "leader_sublog_host_invariant {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |} /\\ leader_sublog_nw_invariant {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |}".

original: unfold raft_net_invariant_client_request. intros. unfold leader_sublog_invariant in *. intros. apply H; auto.
